name: Food Frenzy (FoodFrenzy)
description:
Race Compete Eat

Food Frenzy is a food base racing game. Race against three different types of food as a roll of Sushi, that rolls to victory. Such food being a slice of Pizza with pepperoni for wheels, a Banana that gets propelled by a rocket, and a strip of Bacon that wiggles across the race track. Features three different maps, Sugar Rush a sweet but treacherous course, No More Mr.Rice Guy have a very rice trip, and Lost In The Source don't forgetti these spaghetti.
